responses.gpt4: Good morning, Patient. This is Rachel, your AI nurse from O'Connor Hospital. Just wanted to discuss a few things about your upcoming colonoscopy scheduled for August 17. Would this be an opportune moment to have this discussion? And also, how is your day going so far?
responses.our_model: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Sarkis Koroleva?
